reviews.review: esta bueno la historia que tiene muy buena :v :o

This game kept me happy from the day I bought it to now. It's a shame my computer can't handle anything or it'd probably have more hours to this day. From offline to online I was always attached to the game
 It's truly a work of art. And I miss it more than csgo..

Its 2022 now and I still love hopping on this game from time to time, its always had a place in my heart.

I love to AWP and b-hop in this game. It's so much easier than in CS:GO to bhop and you can move with an awp and still get accurate shots!
This game is old and bad.

this game had such an upbringing to the community. it may seem odd, but with over 250+ hours on CS:GO, i am better with an AK on CS:S, than on there. the game makes me relaxed for not having to scream callouts at teammates, and just being able to play a FPS normally.  i bought it on sale ($0.99) since $9.99 is a little high for a gem game. buy old valve games on sale and not full price. everyone knows that, am i right? but to conclude seriously buy this game.

Had almost 1000 hours on this game on my old steam account, this game is amazing and will always be one of my favorite FPS games of all time.

This game has given me some of the greatest memories while playing a game. It's a fantastic game, but it's a shame its diminished in popularity as time moves on. 

Since I hadn't left a positive review on this game yet, I had to go back and do it now.

In all seriousness, I'm going to review Long Live Santa
I recommend it.

Only problems i have with it are the Dialog & Quests

Dialog:

Yes
No(Yes)
Sarcasm(be an nigger)
Question(Yes)

Quests are a little bit weak in my opinion. I feel there is much of the same, going to help a settlement, getting something for some guy, killing something for some guy. The Quest should be more exciting, each having different twists and turns. Not "kill this guy" "steal this thing" and "steal this thing and kill this guy".
